00124         inline Base* getById(HintId _id)
00125         {
00126             switch(_id)
00127             {
00128             case NullId:
00129                 return (Base*)new Null;
00130                 break;
00131             case LmsNetId:
00132                 return (Base*)new LmsNet;
00133                 break;
00134             case LmsNeuronId:
00135                 return (Base*)new LmsNeuron;
00136                 break;
00137             default:
00138                 throw Exception::ObjectNotFound()<<"LearningHint::getById(): unknown hint id: "<<_id<<"\n";
00139             }
00140         } //getById
00141     };
